sentences.sContent: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.sCn: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.sContent: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
...China will be the largest tourism country which will witness a rapid increase in the outbound tourism expenditures...
...Many factors influence the accuracy of witness testimony...

trans.tranOther: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

trans.tranCn: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
trans.tranOther: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned
